item.description:
Please welcome Paul, Sylvie, and 9-year-old Tristan Hekman to Dover, New Hampshire, USA! The Hekmans are swapping houses with "our" Erin and her family, who arrived in Cravant-les-Côteaux, France, on August 9. The Hekmans threw a petite fête for the Americans' arrival, and Erin's family and friends are returning the favor.

Come to an outdoor potluck at Erin's house in Dover on Sunday afternoon, August 21. If you can't stay for a meal, stop in just to say "Bienvenue"!

===========

NOTES:

This event is not a true French Meetup; it's a collaboration between Erin's [English-speaking] family and friends and the Seacoast NH French Language Meetup Group. Significant others and kids are welcome to attend because other non-Francophones will be present.

No dues will be charged for this event.

If you reply YES, please note how many guests (if applicable) and please let us know what you'll be bringing in the Comments.

If I don't know you already, you'll have to seek me out in the crowd because the Francophones will not necessarily be distinguished from the others!

group.name: Seacoast NH French Language Meetup Group
